import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Header.css'; const Header = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [isDropdownOpen, setIsDropdownOpen] = useState(false); const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user')); const handleLogout = () => { localStorage.removeItem('token'); localStorage.removeItem('user'); navigate('/login'); }; return (
✍️

BlogHub

Home {user ? ( <> Create Post My Posts
{isDropdownOpen && (
Signed in as {user.name}
Profile My Posts Settings
)}
) : (
Login Get Started
)}
); }; export default Header;
